rev.desc.rev.desc: Modified panel set.to.format and changed line:
"if (substr($targetfile, 1,1)="$") then ($targetfile=evaluate($targetfile))"
To:
"if (substr($targetfile, 1, 1)="$") then ($targetfile=evaluate(parse($targetfile, 2)))"
Added the following to the start panel so that the project panel would project the file variable properly:
$L.void=fduplicate($L.source.file, $SOURCE.FILE)
As per recomendation for devtx BUG11813:
Removed all references to $post.first.
I removed the path to no.definition from check.pointer (to remove the reference to $post.)
I also removed "$post.first=false" from three panels (start.1, trap.filenam and set.to.format).
I removed the dead panels no.definition, no.definition.1 as they no longer make since.
devtx BUG11819
Needed to remove the check.add.disp panel to allow format control display processing for posting on updates and not just adds.

Originally, for BUG11815 I moved the following expressions from the evaluate panel to the add.on panel in the post.fc application. However, this caused problems when following the path through either the add.off or the many panel (from the select.target panel). Therefore, I added the same expressions to both the add.off and the many panel in the post.fc application.
$ilx=denull($iri in link.expressions in $post.link)
$il=lng($ilx)
if ($il>0) then for $i = 1 to $il do ($temp=$i in $ilx;$junk=evaluate($temp))
if (not null($iri in javascript.pre in $post.link)) then js($iri in javascript.pre in $post.link)
devtx BUG11819:

Added format control display processing. Modified bad.val exit to set $L.has.fc=true, and now exits to check.get.fc. On the get.fc panel, modified exits for 1 and many recs, they now point to new panel called check.fc.0. Other new panels added include fc.pre.0, check.add.disp, call.add.disp, and pre.add.0. These panels allow for display format control processing to take place (in addition to the add format control processing that is already there).
devtx BUG11815:
moved the following lines of code from the evaluate panel to the add.on panel:
$ilx=denull($iri in link.expressions in $post.link)
$il=lng($ilx)
if ($il>0) then for $i = 1 to $il do ($temp=$i in $ilx;$junk=evaluate($temp))
if (not null($iri in javascript.pre in $post.link)) then js($iri in javascript.pre in $post.link)
devtx BUG11821
Added processing to fc.pre, bad.val, pre.add, and pre.update panels to ensure that contents of $file are not lost after calls are made to call.add.fc and call.upd.fc RAD routines.
added expressions to the evaluate and evaluate.post.expressions panels to process any javascript for each link line
moved the evaluate panel to happen before the moving of the fields and added an evaluate.post.expressions panel after the fields have been moved/projected.
Case insensitivity problem fixes.
Allowed for posts on array fields to post against multiple records.
Replaced qbe panel with genquery.
Added a $post.update.only parameter that will skip posting instead of doing an add (update only).
Added ability to use screlate with posting.
Added auditing option ($post.audit)
Added format control option. ($post.fc)
scmsg
on start.1, val($SUPRESS,4) to turn it in to a boolean, rather than leave it a string if the implementor forgets to val it themself.
The $post.msg will be supressed by default.
hacked around a problem with $File getting overwritten when find or fill is called.

descript.descript: Modified panel set.to.format and changed line:
"if (substr($targetfile, 1,1)="$") then ($targetfile=evaluate($targetfile))"
To:
"if (substr($targetfile, 1, 1)="$") then ($targetfile=evaluate(parse($targetfile, 2)))"
Added the following to the start panel so that the project panel would project the file variable properly:
$L.void=fduplicate($L.source.file, $SOURCE.FILE)
As per recomendation for devtx BUG11813:
Removed all references to $post.first.
I removed the path to no.definition from check.pointer (to remove the reference to $post.)
I also removed "$post.first=false" from three panels (start.1, trap.filenam and set.to.format).
I removed the dead panels no.definition, no.definition.1 as they no longer make since.
devtx BUG11819
Needed to remove the check.add.disp panel to allow format control display processing for posting on updates and not just adds.

Originally, for BUG11815 I moved the following expressions from the evaluate panel to the add.on panel in the post.fc application. However, this caused problems when following the path through either the add.off or the many panel (from the select.target panel). Therefore, I added the same expressions to both the add.off and the many panel in the post.fc application.
$ilx=denull($iri in link.expressions in $post.link)
$il=lng($ilx)
if ($il>0) then for $i = 1 to $il do ($temp=$i in $ilx;$junk=evaluate($temp))
if (not null($iri in javascript.pre in $post.link)) then js($iri in javascript.pre in $post.link)

Added format control display processing. Modified bad.val exit to set $L.has.fc=true, and now exits to check.get.fc. On the get.fc panel, modified exits for 1 and many recs, they now point to new panel called check.fc.0. Other new panels added include fc.pre.0, check.add.disp, call.add.disp, and pre.add.0. These panels allow for display format control processing to take place (in addition to the add format control processing that is already there).
devtx BUG11815:
moved the following lines of code from the evaluate panel to the add.on panel:
$ilx=denull($iri in link.expressions in $post.link)
$il=lng($ilx)
if ($il>0) then for $i = 1 to $il do ($temp=$i in $ilx;$junk=evaluate($temp))
if (not null($iri in javascript.pre in $post.link)) then js($iri in javascript.pre in $post.link)
devtx BUG11821
Added processing to fc.pre, bad.val, pre.add, and pre.update panels to ensure that contents of $file are not lost after calls are made to call.add.fc and call.upd.fc RAD routines.
added expressions to the evaluate and evaluate.post.expressions panels to process any javascript for each link line
moved the evaluate panel to happen before the moving of the fields and added an evaluate.post.expressions panel after the fields have been moved/projected.
Case insensitivity problem fixes.
Allowed for posts on array fields to post against multiple records.
Replaced qbe panel with genquery.
Added a $post.update.only parameter that will skip posting instead of doing an add (update only).
Added ability to use screlate with posting.
Added auditing option ($post.audit)
Added format control option.
scmsg
on start.1, val($SUPRESS,4) to turn it in to a boolean, rather than leave it a string if the implementor forgets to val it themself.
The $post.msg will be supressed by default.
hacked around a problem with $File getting overwritten when find or fill is called.
